answers.answer: Yes I did...I was worried myself...don't worry most people fail the one hour and past the three hour one...I read about it too...biggest mistake ever lol....don't worry :)
Yes I did...I was worried myself...don't worry most people fail the one hour and past the three hour one...I read about it too...biggest mistake ever lol....don't worry :)
Yes I did I was off by 2 points n took the 3 hour n passed it  they told me lost of women fail the one hour n pass the 3 hour
My 1 hr was 140 and I passed three hr.  I have to do it again in a few weeks.  I have a family history of diabetes so I'm glad they are taking extra precautions.
I.passed the 3 hour.with my.middle.son.but ended.up.with gestational diabetes with my youngest son I was able to control it with diet it was not bad
Thanks ladies! That makes me feel much better. :)
I failed the one hour BAD and we were sure I would fail the 3 hour, but I passed, my body just takes a little longer to distribute the sugar.

question: So, I just found out I failed my glucose test. :( She said I barely failed but I'm soo worried.. I, of course, did the complete wrong thing and read about gestational diabetes online and got completely freaked out! My question is, has anyone failed the 1 hour test and then passed the 3 hour one?
title: Failed 1 hour glucose test
